name: Apocalipse Rising
description: A game made by students from Rio Gamer, from the company Alpha Sprite, which is composed by them: Flávio Augusto Gabriel Victor Jeorge Lucas  A game aimed at devices such as: PC and NOTEBOOK, no practice other than the menu runs on MOBILE and TABLET devices.  A typically classic shooter, with two phases, having to survive killing the zombies that will attack you, have fun.
